cruise_lines.name: Carnival Cruise Line
cruise_lines.description: Carnival Cruise Line is a leader in contemporary cruising and operates a fleet of ships designed to provide fun, memorable vacations at an outstanding value.

cruise_lines.name: Royal Caribbean
cruise_lines.description: Royal Caribbean International is known for driving innovation at sea and has continuously redefined cruise vacations since its launch in 1969.

cruise_lines.name: Norwegian Cruise Line
cruise_lines.description: Norwegian Cruise Line is the innovator in cruise travel with a 50-year history of breaking the boundaries of traditional cruising.
